description: spec: Clarify map iteration semantics when entries are added

messages.text:
Hello iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/7097044/diff/5001/doc/go_spec.html
File doc/go_spec.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7097044/diff/5001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode4414
doc/go_spec.html:4414: iteration values for each inserted entry will be produced at most once. If the map
i think we also need to say that iteration of
original entries is not affected by insertion.

subject: code review 7097044: spec: Clarify map iteration semantics when entries are added
